text: Thunder on the Left is a novel by Christopher Morley, originally published in 1925. In it, Morley looks at maturity, individual growth, and human nature. It was adapted as a play by Jean Ferguson Black in 1934. Movie rights in perpetuity were sold to Picture Entertainment International, Lee Caplin, for $52,000 in the 1990s. ==Editions== *Garden City, New York : Doubleday, Page & Company, 1925 LCCN 25027460 *Garden City, New York : Doubleday, Page & Company, 1926 *Garden City, N.Y., Doubleday, Doran & Company, Inc., 1936 LCCN 36009351 *New York, Philosophical Library [1959] LCCN 59016366 *Los Angeles, CA : Sun & Moon Press, 1995 LCCN 94048249 ; *Poughkeepsie, NY : Vivisphere, 2000 LCCN 00101946 ; ==References== ==External links== * Category:1925 American novels Category:Doubleday, Page & Company books
